title: How To Create Set Build in New League Client? (as of November 2016)
body:
When i installed the 6.22 update i was trying out some new champs and with the new interface of the 6.22 client i could not find the place to create set builds. If this is not yet added please tell me, if you know where it is please leave instructions in the comments.
Thanks -Jenkins

replies.body: It isn't added into the new client yet. That said you will still be able to use any item sets created in the legacy client, and you can still switch back to the legacy client from the login page.

Ok, thanks for the info.
Much appreciated
Yet when i try to launch the legacy client nothing happens. Am i doing something wrong here?

I know some people have had some trouble with the legacy client lately but I don't know anything about any fixes sorry. Probably best to submit a support ticket for that one. It'll take a couple days for them to get back to you though.

https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new

Thank you again.
You've been lots of help :D
